meanings.definition: To give (a gift that one has received) to someone else as a gift.
meanings.sent1: She regifted the scarf her friend gave her last Christmas.
meanings.sent2: It is common to regift items that are not needed.
meanings.sent3: He regifted the ugly sweater to his brother, hoping it would find a better home.
meanings.sent4: The act of regifting can sometimes lead to awkward situations.
meanings.sent5: Regifting can be a thoughtful way to pass on items to others who may appreciate them more.

meanings.definition: The act of giving a gift that one has received to someone else as a gift.
meanings.sent1: Regifted presents can sometimes bring joy to new recipients.
meanings.sent2: She discovered the regifted candle hidden in the back of her closet.
meanings.sent3: The regifted book made its way around the family during the holidays.
meanings.sent4: The regifted items filled the donation box with unexpected treasures.
meanings.sent5: The regifted vase became a symbol of generosity among friends.
